My video

VIEWLIFT EXTENDS YOUR REACH PRECISELY WHERE YOUR USERS ARE

You have great content, but your audience is evolving. People are streaming more everyday, on their cellphones, tablets, set-top boxes, game consoles, & Internet connected TVs. Cable isn’t enough any more. ViewLift was created to help you overcome this hurdle. You shouldn’t have to be an expert on every platform that comes into the market.You have a great brand and you know your audience. Let us help you reach them in the places they go to view content, with the strongest possible offering.

Features

Your Brand, Your Experience

ViewLift creates stand-alone branded applications for the devices your audience already uses, giving them the ability to engage with your content on their phones, tablets, set-top boxes, game consoles, & Internet connected TV’s. Our applications even allow your users to stream from their mobile device to a TV, creating a true multiscreen experience.

The Best Viewing Experience

By utilizing adaptive streaming and multi-CDN optimization ViewLift ensures an optimal viewing experience for your audience, whether they’re on Wi-Fi at home or using their wireless broadband connection on the go.

Monetization

Monetize your videos and content the way you want. Through integrated support for industry leading payment gateways ViewLift fully supports all types of business models from TVOD, SVOD, PPV, & AVOD, where we partner with market-leading ad providers and programmatic sources to ensure you get the best possible return on your views.

Detailed Analytics

Gain valuable insight into your audience, their viewing experience, and evaluate content performance. ViewLift gives you the reporting tools to make intelligent business decisions in real time. Giving content owners the keys to driving higher revenue.

Security & Encryption

Your content is valuable and we want to protect it. ViewLift’s built in content protection utilizes the highest quality encryption technology in addition to configurable permissions at the geographic, time-based, & user level to safeguard your content.

Content management

Easily upload and organize your content in our secure system. ViewLift allows you to efficiently handle complex metadata and content preparation providing updates to your applications in real-time.

Platforms

Stream and distribute videos online across multiple platforms including Website, iOS, Android, Roku, SONY, Samsung, LG, WD, Panasonic, Opera/TIVO, Android TV, Amazon, Fire TV, Amazon Fire Phone, PS3, PS4 , XBOX

Mobile/Tablets

Smart Tvs

Streaming Players/Gaming Consoles

Online

Our Services

DESIGN & DEVELOPMENT

We will design, develop, QC and launch gorgeous and compelling applications that bring your brand and content to every major mobile, over-the-top, connected TV and game console platform.

set up/hosting

In addition to hosting and streaming your content ViewLift can setup and manage hosting for your applications. We manage and host applications all over the world and will make sure your content is available to your audience where and when they want it.

Increase Revenue

ViewLift works with the most advanced ad technologies in the industry to ensure the highest return for your inventory. Benefit from our custom ad-server configuration to maximize fill and CPM from direct ads, networks, DSPs, and exchanges across all devices. And if your business model is selling individual views of your content or creating a subscription service, we can help you maximize your revenue and impact.

Marketing and RELATIONSHIP MANAGEMENT

Put our expert team and marketplace leadership to work securing best pricing, top messaging and enhanced placement for your presence on each platform.

Full Service Support

Benefit from our expertise. ViewLift can manage your applications for you to ensure that you are getting the best return for your content.

CONTENT CURATION & ACQUISITION

Need more great video to delight your customers? We can provide you with some of the world’s best, from our huge library or specially licensed for you from all top providers.

About/Contact us

We don’t just build award-winning applications and other digital products for others; we have created and operated them for our own consumer-facing brands.  Part of the SnagFilms family (which includes Indiewire), our team has won two Webbys and been a finalist for a third; is a finalist for the 2014 Cynopsis Connected TV Platform award; received critical acclaim from every major tech blog; and been named a Top 100 company in North America by Red Herring. And we are owned by the giants in media and technology, from Comcast and New Enterprise Associates, to Steve Case and Ted Leonsis, and Terry Semel to the Knight Foundation. We will give you a start-up’s responsiveness with big league backing.

665 Broadway, Suite 700, New York, NY 10012

001-917-289-7000 (NY, USA)

sales@viewlift.com

www.viewlift.com
